Name: KIOLAStandardTreatmentPlanTagCS
Title: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Code System
Descriptino: Meta data tags of standard treatment plans.

Name: KIOLACarePlanCategoryCS
Title: KIOLA Care Plan Category Code System
Descriptino: Categories of care plans supported by KIOLA.

Name: KIOLACarePlanTransientTagCS
Title: KIOLA Care Plan Transient Tag Code System
Descriptino: Meta data tags of care plans that should be removed when creating an updated plan for a patient, in case an activity changes.

Name: KIOLADeviceCS
Title: KIOLA Device Codes
Descriptino: Generic device types that can transmit vital data.

Name: KIOLAMDCCS
Title: KIOLA Device Codes AIT 11073
Descriptino: Measurement device types for automatic transmission of measurements and their configuration parameters, based on the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard with vendor-specific extensions, mainly AIT. The MDC display name is used as a code.

Name: KIOLADeviceKMCCS
Title: KMC Device Codes
Descriptino: Various codes that might be used to configure a mobile client.

Name: KIOLAMDCDIMCS
Title: KIOLA Dimension Codes AIT 11073
Descriptino: Measurement dimensions supported by KIOLA, based on the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard with vendor-specific extensions, mainly AIT. The MDC display name is used as a code.  All codes might be parametrized using the syntax `CODE:{min=MIN_VAL,max=MAX_VAL}` to define a plausibility range for manual data entry, e.g.: `MDC_DIM_MILLI_G_PER_DL:{min=0,max=1000}`

Name: KIOLAMeasurementCS
Title: KIOLA Measurement Codes
Descriptino: Types of vital data measurements that can be transmitted to a KIOLA system. The naming is derived from MDC display names of devices from the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard.
